AKSA.IS.summary: Aksa Akrilik Kimya Sanayii A.S., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures textiles and chemicals products in Turkey and internationally. It operates through three segments: Fibers, Energy, and Other. The company offers textile fibers, outdoor fibers, acrylic filament yarns, modacrylic fibers, and industrial fibers for knitting and hand knitting, carpet, home textile and upholstery, toy/hi-pile products, UV resistant, technical application, and protective garments. It also provides raw and auxiliary materials, as well as intermediate substances; artificial, synthetic, and natural fibers, as well as carbon fibers, and filament and polymers; and equipment, machinery, and spare parts used in the production, processing, and storage activity, as well as engages in the marketing and trading activity. In addition, the company generates and sells electricity; and rents real estate properties. It imports and exports its products to domestic, foreign, and international branches. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Yalova, Turkey.

ARSAN.IS.long_name: Arsan Tekstil Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
ARSAN.IS.summary: Arsan Tekstil Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells yarns in Turkey. It offers open-end, carded ring, and combed yarns of cotton; acrylic, cotton/acrylic, and cotton/polyester; and corespun, compact, and regenerated fiber yarns. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Kahramanmaras, Turkey.

ASUZU.IS.long_name: Anadolu Isuzu Otomotiv Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ASUZU.IS.summary: Anadolu Isuzu Otomotiv Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells commercial vehicles in Turkey. The company offers light and heavy duty trucks, midi buses, buses, and pick-up vehicles. It also engages in the sale of spare parts for commercial vehicles. The company also exports commercial vehicles to Western Europe, Asia, and South America. Anadolu Isuzu Otomotiv Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ATEKS.IS.summary: Akin Tekstil Anonim Sirketi produces and sells fabrics in Turkey and internationally. It also offers technical yarns and textiles. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

AYCES.IS.long_name: Altin Yunus Çesme Turistik Tesisler A.S.
AYCES.IS.summary: Altin Yunus Ãesme Turistik Tesisler A.S. operates a hotel in Turkey. Its facilities and amenities cover meeting and conference, bar and restaurant, spa, wedding and banquet, catering, and outdoor meetings and events. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Izmir, Turkey. Altin Yunus Ãesme Turistik Tesisler A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding AS.

BAKAB.IS.long_name: Bak Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BAKAB.IS.summary: Bak Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells printed, unprinted, and laminated flexible packaging products for various sectors worldwide. The company offers its packaging products for snack foods, biscuits, sugar and chocolate confectionaries, breads and fresh foods, instant foods and drinks, dried foods and pastas, coffee and tea products, chemicals and hygiene products, and other products. Bak Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1973 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

BALAT.IS.long_name: Balatacilar Balatacilik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
BALAT.IS.summary: Balatacilar Balatacilik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells friction materials in Turkey. The company's products include brake blocks and pads for heavy vehicles, trucks, and trailers applications; brake linings for light commercial vehicles; clutches; fiber based clutch facings; and industrial friction materials for various applications. It sells its products under the ERKA, Besyildiz, SAFETEX, and FiveStar brands. The company also exports its products to Algeria, Tunisia, Egypt, Iran, Iraq, Syria, Jordan, Macedonia, Kazakhstan, New Guinea, and Portugal. Balatacilar Balatacilik Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1988 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

BAYRK.IS.long_name: Bayrak EBT Taban Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
BAYRK.IS.summary: Bayrak Ebt Taban Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in manufacturing PVC and thermo shoe soles for various brands. The company is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

BFREN.IS.long_name: Bosch Fren Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BFREN.IS.summary: Bosch Fren Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells hydraulic brake systems for automotive and light commercial vehicles in Turkey and internationally. It offers servo brakes, and brake master cylinders and support systems. The company was incorporated in 1975 and is headquartered in Bursa, Turkey. Bosch Fren Sistemleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH.

BIZIM.IS.summary: Bizim Toptan Satis Magazalari A.S. wholesales and retails of fast moving consumer goods in Turkey. The company offers dry food, delicatessen and breakfast products; paper products; home supplies and care products, hand tools, communication, meat and meat products, milk and dairy products, fruits and vegetables, beverages, cosmetics and personal care products, cleaning products, electronic and electrical appliances, energy and lighting, office and stationery, and snacks and bakery products to wholesalers, merchants, grocers, markets, supermarkets, specialized retailers, hotels, restaurants, and cafes, as well as to tax payers and legal entities, such as small dealers, small markets, canteens, catering companies, corporate customers, and industrial and public organizations. It wholesales approximately 7000 product types consisting of branded and private label products. The company sells its product through Bizimtoptan.com.tr, a digital sales platform. As of March 31, 2019, it had 175 stores in 69 cities; and 801 franchise shops. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Bizim Toptan Satis Magazalari A.S. is a subsidiary of Yildiz Holding A.S.

BJKAS.IS.long_name: Besiktas Futbol Yatirimlari Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BJKAS.IS.summary: Besiktas Futbol Yatirimlari Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in professional football activities in Turkey. It also invests in professional football teams; and establishes and operates football facilities. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

BNTAS.IS.long_name: Bantas Bandirma Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BNTAS.IS.summary: Bantas Bandirma Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in tin packaging production activities. The company offers tin cans for olives, cheese, pickles, and olive and vegetable oils. It also serves the mineral oil, and paint industries. In addition, the company exports its products worldwide. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Balikesir, Turkey.

BOSSA.IS.long_name: Bossa Ticaret ve Sanayi Isletmeleri T.A.S.
BOSSA.IS.summary: Bossa Ticaret ve Sanayi Isletmeleri T.A.S. manufactures, markets, and sells textile products in Turkey and internationally. It offers various denim fabrics. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Adana, Turkey.

BRISA.IS.long_name: Brisa Bridgestone Sabanci Lastik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BRISA.IS.summary: Brisa Bridgestone Sabanci Lastik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells tires in Turkey. It offers tires for passenger cars, light commercial vehicles, buses, trucks, tractors, and construction equipment under the Bridgestone, Lassa, Firestone, Dayton, and Kinesis brands; retreading tires under the Bandag brand name; and batteries under the Energizer brand. The company also provides road help services under the Bridgestone Road Friend Hot Line, Lassa Road Help, and Filofix brand names; and tire storage services under the Profleet, Mobilfix, and Tyre Hotel brands, as well as operates the Brisa Academy training channel. It offers its products and services through approximately 1200 signboarded sales and service points under the Otopratik, Propratik, Lastigim, Lastik Vs., and Speedy brands; and alternative sales channels, such as Bridgestone Box and lastik.com.tr name. The company was formerly known as Lassa Lastik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Brisa Bridgestone Sabanci Lastik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in 1988. Brisa Bridgestone Sabanci Lastik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1974 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

BRKO.IS.long_name: Birko Birlesik Koyunlulular Mensucat Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S.
BRKO.IS.summary: Birko Birlesik Koyunlulular Mensucat Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. produces and sells machinery carpets in Turkey and internationally. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Nigde, Turkey.

BRMEN.IS.long_name: Birlik Mensucat Ticaret ve Sanayi Isletmesi A.S.
BRMEN.IS.summary: Birlik Mensucat Ticaret ve Sanayi Isletmesi A.S. manufactures and sells cotton yarns in Turkey and internationally. The company offers cotton terry towels, bathrobes, home textile products, curtains, mattresses, and bed bases under the SOLEY brand. It also provides gabardine and poplin fabrics. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Kayseri, Turkey.

DAGI.IS.long_name: Dagi Giyim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
DAGI.IS.summary: Dagi Giyim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates in the garment industry in Turkey and internationally. It primarily produces and sells underwear, nighties, dresses, T-shirts, trousers, capri, shorts, sweatshirts, sportswear, thermal bottom and tops, maternity nightgowns, swimsuits, socks, and beach and household products for men, women, and children. The company sells its products through online and retail stores. Dagi Giyim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1984 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

DERHL.IS.summary: Derluks Deri Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the manufacture, buying, sale, import, and export of leather garments, leather accessories, and use products for men, women, and children. The company markets its products in Asia, Europe, America, and the Far East. Derluks Deri Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 2002 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

DERIM.IS.long_name: Derimod Konfeksiyon Ayakkabi Deri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
DERIM.IS.summary: Derimod Konfeksiyon Ayakkabi Deri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. provides leather and fashionable products for men and women in Turkey and internationally. Its products include leather jackets and coats, bags, cross body bags, loafers, backpacks, waist bags, shoulder bags, briefcases, clutch and portfolio products, purses/wallets, wristlets, gloves, slippers, casual and classic shoes, shoe care products and accessories, belts, boots, sports shoes and sneakers, heels, and flat and heeled sandals. The company also operates stores. Derimod Konfeksiyon Ayakkabi Deri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1974 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

DESA.IS.long_name: Desa Deri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
DESA.IS.summary: Desa Deri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures, imports, and export, and sells leather and leather products primarily in Turkey. The company offers ready-to-wear, bags, shoes, and various leather craft products for men and women. It markets and sells its products through 132 retail stores, including 63 Desa, 39 Desa Samsonite, 3 Desa franchise, 2 Albania franchise, 17 Samsonite JV, 3 Tumi, and 5 virtual stores; 2 Desa franchise store in Albania; and 109 overseas stores. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Desa Deri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Ãelet Holding A.S.

DGATE.IS.long_name: Datagate Bilgisayar Malzemeleri Ticaret Anonim Sriketi
DGATE.IS.summary: Datagate Bilgisayar Malzemeleri Ticaret Anonim Sirketi distributes information technology products in Turkey. It offers smart phones, tablets, modems, notebooks, and accessories, as well as security, wearable technology, smart living, and computer products. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Datagate Bilgisayar Malzemeleri Ticaret Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Indeks Bilgisayar Sistemleri MÃ¼hendislik Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S.

DGKLB.IS.long_name: Dogtas Kelebek Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
DGKLB.IS.summary: Dogtas Kelebek Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells furniture in Turkey. The company offers furniture for living rooms, such as living room sets, corner sets, double and triple seats, and armchairs; dining rooms, including TV units, chairs, brackets, dining tables, and showcases; and bedrooms comprising accessories, cabinets, chests, interior, curbstone, and bed. It also provides bookcases, working tables, and chambers; coffee tables, mirrors, puffs, dresuars, and accessories; and home office products and pedestals. The company offers its products under the Dogtas, Butterfly, Kelebek Kitchen & Bathroom, Love Bed, and Ruum Store brands. In addition, it exports its products in 15 countries. The company was founded in 1935 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

DIRIT.IS.long_name: Diriteks Dirilis Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
DIRIT.IS.summary: Diriteks Dirilis Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells mink type blankets and non-slip carpets. It also offers acrylic yarn for use in the production of blankets and carpets. The company sells its products through dealers in Turkey and through distributors internationally. Diriteks Dirilis Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Isparta, Turkey.

DITAS.IS.long_name: Ditas Dogan Yedek Parça Imalat ve Teknik A.S.
DITAS.IS.summary: Ditas Dogan Yedek ParÃ§a Imalat ve Teknik A.S. manufactures and sells vehicle steering and suspension parts to vehicle manufacturers in Turkey. It offers rod ends, tie rods, torque and V-torque rods, idler arms, axial joints, pitman arms, drag links, ball joints, track control arms, and stabilizer links. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Nigde, Turkey. Ditas Dogan Yedek ParÃ§a Imalat ve Teknik A.S. is a subsidiary of Dogan Sirketler Grubu Holding A.S.

DMSAS.IS.long_name: Demisas Döküm Emaye Mamülleri Sanayi Anonim Sirketi
DMSAS.IS.summary: Demisas DÃ¶kÃ¼m Emaye MamÃ¼lleri Sanayi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and markets iron casting products in Turkey. Its products include brake disks and drums, flywheels and pressure plates, exhaust manifolds, involutes, brake and engine brackets, brake safety parts, wishbones, cell connector and supporting parts, compressor housings, pump housings, valve bodies, rail fastening components, scaffolding fittings, compressor parts, and other fittings, as well as machined parts. The company offers products for automotive, white goods, machine manufacturing, water systems, railway, hydraulic, and construction sectors. It also exports its products to France, Italy, Belgium, Romania, Poland, Tunisia, the Czech Republic, and internationally. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Kocaeli, Turkey.

DOAS.IS.long_name: Dogus Otomotiv Servis ve Ticaret A.S.
DOAS.IS.summary: Dogus Otomotiv Servis ve Ticaret A.S., together with its subsidiaries, imports, markets, and sells passenger cars, light commercial vehicles, heavy vehicles, industrial and marine engines, and cooling systems in Turkey. The company distributes vehicles of various brands, including Volkswagen, Audi, SEAT, ÂKODA, Bentley, Lamborghini, Bugatti, Porsche, and Scania. It also provides industrial and marine engines under the Scania Engines brand; and climate control systems under the Thermoking brand. In addition, the company is involved in used car operations through its dealer network under the DOD brand. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Ãayirova, Turkey.

DOKTA.IS.long_name: Döktas Dökümcülük Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S.
DOKTA.IS.summary: DÃ¶ktas DÃ¶kÃ¼mcÃ¼lÃ¼k Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells pig, ductile, and aluminum castings for automotive, heavy commercial vehicles, construction, and agricultural machinery industries in Turkey. The company also produces aluminum wheels. It also exports its products. DÃ¶ktas DÃ¶kÃ¼mcÃ¼lÃ¼k Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi was formerly known as Componenta DÃ¶kÃ¼mcÃ¼lÃ¼k Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi and changed its name to DÃ¶ktas DÃ¶kÃ¼mcÃ¼lÃ¼k Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi in April 2018. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Bursa, Turkey. DÃ¶ktas DÃ¶kÃ¼mcÃ¼lÃ¼k Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Ãelik Holding A.S.

DURDO.IS.long_name: Duran Dogan Basim ve Ambalaj Sanayi A.S.
DURDO.IS.summary: Duran Dogan Basim ve Ambalaj Sanayi A.S., together with its subsidiaries, provides packaging products in Turkey. It offers chocolate and confectionary, food, spirits, personal care and cosmetics, OTC, and nonfood packaging products; and rigid-setup boxes. The company also exports its products to the United Kingdom, Ireland, Belgium, France, the United States, and Russia. Duran Dogan Basim ve Ambalaj Sanayi A.S. was founded in 1953 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

EGEEN.IS.summary: Ege EndÃ¼stri ve Ticaret A.S. develops, manufactures, and sells axle and axle parts for the automotive industry in Turkey and internationally. It offers differential sleeves, complete rear axles, additional axles, trailer axles, directional additional axles, front axles, bellows carriers, independent suspension front axle system, and other axles components. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Izmir, Turkey. Ege EndÃ¼stri ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Bayraktar Holding A.S.

EMNIS.IS.long_name: Eminis Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
EMNIS.IS.summary: Eminis Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells plastic and metal packaging solutions in Turkey and internationally. Its products are used for paints, glues, lube oils, chemicals, ice creams, yoghurts, cheese, frozen foods, honey, jams, olives, hazelnut cocoa-butter, candies, spices/powder, drinks, hair gel, and cosmetic products. The company serves for paint, chemicals, and food sectors. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Dilovasi, Turkey.

ETILR.IS.long_name: Etiler Gida Ve Ticari Yatirimlar Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
ETILR.IS.summary: Etiler Gida Ve Ticari Yatirimlar Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi operates fast-food spots under the Etiler Marmaris name. It offers burgers, toasts, cold sandwiches, potatoes, doner-meatballs, salads, soups, and beverages, as well as breakfast plates. The company operates 45 branches in 15 cities in Turkey. Etiler Gida Ve Ticari Yatirimlar Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1964 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

FENER.IS.summary: FenerbahÃ§e Futbol A.S. provides commercial and related services for football club. It also distributes, markets, and sells Fenerbahce licensed products through 76 stores, as well as corners and website. The company was founded in 1907 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. FenerbahÃ§e Futbol A.S. is a subsidiary of FenerbahÃ§e S.K.

FLAP.IS.long_name: Flap Kongre Toplanti Hizmetleri Otomotiv ve Turizm A.S.
FLAP.IS.summary: Flap Kongre Toplanti Hizmetleri Otomotiv ve Turizm A.S. plans and organizes events and meetings under Flap Tour brand name for the tourism industry. The company organizes product launch meetings, education meetings, dealers meetings, and corporate opening organizations. It is also involved in organizing press meetings and bulletins; and the preparation of the printed materials for presentations. In addition, the company offers association management services, such as general management and secretariat, membership succeeding, course and seminar organizations, finance and budget management, and Web services; and IT and graphic design services, including logo and visual projects for congress and meetings, design and printing of printed materials, online abstract module software, electronic poster module software, congress registration and accommodation module software, and internal use web server and customizable software options. Further, it provides ticketing services; and tracks payments and contracts of the hotel projects. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

FMIZP.IS.long_name: Federal-Mogul Izmit Piston Ve Pim Üretim Tesisleri A.S.
FMIZP.IS.summary: Federal-Mogul Izmit Piston Ve Pim Ãretim Tesisleri A.S. provides pistons and pins in Turkey. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Kocaeli, Turkey. Federal-Mogul Izmit Piston Ve Pim Ãretim Tesisleri A.S. is a subsidiary of Federal Mogul Powertrain Otomotiv A.S.

FO9A.SG.summary: Ford Otomotiv Sanayi A.S. manufactures, assembles, imports, exports, and sells motor vehicles and spare parts in Turkey. It offers commercial, transit and transit custom, and transit courier vehicles; and cargo trucks, as well as engines and powertrain products for trucks and transit vehicles. The company also imports and sells passenger cars. Ford Otomotiv Sanayi A.S. has a collaboration with Velodyne Lidar, Inc. for the product development and testing of autonomous heavy commercial trucks. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

FOVSY.summary: Ford Otomotiv Sanayi A.S. manufactures, assembles, imports, exports, and sells motor vehicles and spare parts in Turkey. It offers commercial, transit and transit custom, and transit courier vehicles; and cargo trucks, as well as engines and powertrain products for trucks and transit vehicles. The company also imports and sells passenger cars. Ford Otomotiv Sanayi A.S. has a collaboration with Velodyne Lidar, Inc. for the product development and testing of autonomous heavy commercial trucks. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

FROTO.IS.summary: Ford Otomotiv Sanayi A.S. manufactures, assembles, imports, exports, and sells motor vehicles and spare parts in Turkey. It offers commercial, transit and transit custom, and transit courier vehicles; and cargo trucks, as well as engines and powertrain products for trucks and transit vehicles. The company also imports and sells passenger cars. Ford Otomotiv Sanayi A.S. has a collaboration with Velodyne Lidar, Inc. for the product development and testing of autonomous heavy commercial trucks. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

GENTS.IS.long_name: Gentas Dekoratif Yuzeyler Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
GENTS.IS.summary: Gentas Dekoratif Yuzeyler Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells tabletops, school tables, building profiles, and chairs in Turkey and internationally. The company was formerly known as Gentas Genel Metal Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Gentas Dekoratif Yuzeyler Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in April 2020. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

GOODY.IS.summary: Goodyear Lastikleri T.A.S. develops, produces, distributes, and sells tires and tire related products under the Goodyear, Fulda, Sava, and Debica brands worldwide. The company offers its rubber tire products for light trucks, truckers, and motorcycles; earthmoving, mining, and industrial equipment; and racing, aviation, and various other applications. The company was founded in 1961 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Goodyear Lastikleri T.A.S. is a subsidiary of The Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company.

GSRAY.IS.long_name: Galatasaray Sportif Sinai ve Ticari Yatirimlar A.S.
GSRAY.IS.summary: Galatasaray Sportif Sinai ve Ticari Yatirimlar A.S. engages in the commercial, industrial, and investment activities for various sports. It also develops and invests in real estate properties. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Galatasaray Sportif Sinai ve Ticari Yatirimlar A.S. is a subsidiary of Galatasaray Spor Kulubu Derbegi.

HATEK.IS.summary: Hateks Hatay Tekstil Isletmeleri A.S. manufactures and exports textile products. The company offers towels, bathrobes, and bathmats, as well as special terry products. It also provides cotton raw, dyed, and melange yarns; cotton gazed mercerized raw and dyed yarns; bamboo raw, dyed, and melange yarns; core spun yarns; and amicor yarns, as well as sewing and embroidery threads. The company sells its products to department stores, retailers, wholesalers, and linen brands in European and North American countries. Hateks Hatay Tekstil Isletmeleri A.S. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Hatay, Turkey.

IEYHO.IS.long_name: Isiklar Enerji ve Yapi Holding A.S.
IEYHO.IS.summary: Isiklar Enerji ve Yapi Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, operates in the paper sack, casting, energy, construction and contracting, textile, and building materials fields in Turkey and internationally. The company operates three river type hydroelectric power plants. It also manufactures, sells, and exports kraft sacks, and paper sacks; and provides alloyed grinding products to cement and mining companies. In addition, the company manufactures pressed, coating, and floor bricks; cotto, clinker pang hand, and facade systems; and flex joint sealants and adhesives, ceramics adhesives and joint sealants, liquid silicones, and brick surface cleaners. Further, it manufactures, sells, and exports polyester yarns; and constructs water structures, bridges, tunnels, roads, factories, treatment plants, infra-structure facilities, pipelines, houses, and commercial buildings. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

INTEM.IS.long_name: Intema Insaat ve Tesisat Malzemeleri Yatirim ve Pazarlama A.S.
INTEM.IS.summary: Intema Insaat ve Tesisat Malzemeleri Yatirim ve Pazarlama A.S. markets and sells building products in Turkey. It offers bathroom sets, bathroom furniture and fixtures, acrylic bathtubs, armature and bathroom accessories, ceramic tiles, shower enclosures, kitchen fixtures, shower systems, mirrors and lighting elements, radiators, and towel dryers, construction chemicals, and complementary products under the Vitra, ARTEMA, INTEMA KITCHEN, VILLEROY & BOCH, and Burgbad brands. The company provides its products through its retail stores, as well as through wholesale channels. Intema Insaat ve Tesisat Malzemeleri Yatirim ve Pazarlama A.S. was founded in 1978 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ISBIR.IS.summary: Isbir Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces, markets, and sells home furnishing products. It provides spring and foam mattresses, as well as polyurethane foam products, and mesh and big bags. The company is also involved in the insurance brokerage and investment businesses. Isbir Holding A.S. was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

JANTS.IS.long_name: Jantsa Jant Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
JANTS.IS.summary: Jantsa Jant Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells steel wheels for commercial, industrial, and agricultural machinery primarily in Turkey. The company offers agricultural and multi-purpose wheels for tractors, implements, trailers, forestry, harvesters, sprayers, and row-crop products; industrial wheels for use in construction, material handling, earthmoving, and mining applications; and commercial wheels for trucks, buses, and trailers, as well as military wheels. It supplies its products to OEM and aftermarket customers. The company also exports its products to approximately 85 countries. Jantsa Jant Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Aydin, Turkey.

KAPLM.IS.long_name: Kaplamin Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
KAPLM.IS.summary: Kaplamin Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells packaging materials in Turkey. It provides corrugated boards for food, durable, chemical and cleaning, automotive, heavy duty, ceramic tiles and sanitary ware, and YSM packaging applications. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

KARSN.IS.long_name: Karsan Otomotiv Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S.
KARSN.IS.summary: Karsan Otomotiv Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells motor vehicles and spare parts in Turkey. The company provides minibuses, buses, light commercial vehicles, and trucks. It also offers industrial services, including cataphoresis, painting, truck haulage, and bus chassis and tractor cabin production services, as well as marketing, sales, and after-sales services. The company sells its products under the Karsan Jest, Karsan Atak, Karsan Star, Hyundai H350, Menarinibus, and Bozankaya brand names. It also exports its products to Italy, Romania, France, Portugal, Lithuania, Greece, Germany, Switzerland, Bulgaria, Poland, Spain, Slovakia, Macedonia, the Netherlands, Hungary, South Korea, Austria, and Georgia. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Bursa, Turkey. Karsan Otomotiv Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of KiraÃ§a Holding A.S.

KARTN.IS.long_name: Kartonsan Karton Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
KARTN.IS.summary: Kartonsan Karton Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and trades in coated cardboards in Turkey. It offers normprint, exprint, and luxtriplex multi-coated cardboards from recycled paper. The company's products are used for the packaging of food, pharmaceuticals, detergents, matches, cosmetics, textiles, stationary, glassware and small appliances, book and notebook covers, and corrugated lamination. It also exports its products to approximately 20 countries, including Bulgaria, Greece, Spain, Portugal, the United Kingdom, Romania, and Egypt. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

KERVN.IS.summary: Kervansaray Yatirim Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, import, export, and sale of textile products in Turkey and internationally. It offers men's shirts and knitwear, as well as blouses for ladies. The company is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

KORDS.IS.summary: Kordsa Teknik Tekstil A.S. manufactures and sells carcass and industrial fabrics. The company offers carcass and industrial fabrics that are used in the structure of vehicle tires; rubber and plastic materials, such as transmission belts, V belts, rubber hoses, etc.; and denier fiber and connection fabrics. It also produces and markets fabrics for mechanical rubber goods and other rubber reinforcement materials; converts various types of yarns into cord fabrics; and provides nylon 6, nylon 6.6, and polyethylene-terephthalate high modulus low shrinkage polyester, as well as rayon heavy decitex yarns for use in tires and mechanical rubber goods. The company offers its products primarily to the tire, construction, and composite reinforcement industries. It primarily operates in North America, South America, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and Asia. The company was formerly known as Kordsa EndÃ¼striyel Iplik ve Kord Bezi Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi and changed its name to Kordsa Teknik Tekstil Anonim Sirketi in March 2017. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Izmit, Turkey. Kordsa Teknik Tekstil A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Haci Ãmer Sabanci Holding A.S.

KRSOF.short_name: KARSAN OTOMOTIVE SANAY II VE TI
KRSOF.long_name: Karsan Otomotiv Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S.
KRSOF.summary: Karsan Otomotiv Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells motor vehicles and spare parts in Turkey. The company provides minibuses, buses, light commercial vehicles, and trucks. It also offers industrial services, including cataphoresis, painting, truck haulage, and bus chassis and tractor cabin production services, as well as marketing, sales, and after-sales services. The company sells its products under the Karsan Jest, Karsan Atak, Karsan Star, Hyundai H350, Menarinibus, and Bozankaya brand names. It also exports its products to Italy, Romania, France, Portugal, Lithuania, Greece, Germany, Switzerland, Bulgaria, Poland, Spain, Slovakia, Macedonia, the Netherlands, Hungary, South Korea, Austria, and Georgia. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Bursa, Turkey. Karsan Otomotiv Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of KiraÃ§a Holding A.S.

KRTEK.IS.long_name: Karsu Tekstil Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S.
KRTEK.IS.summary: Karsu Tekstil Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells yarns in Turkey. The company offers modal, tencel, viscose, banboo, viloft, cotton, linen, silk, cashmere, wool, and mÃ©lange fashion yarns; viloft, coolmax, thermolite, seacell, smartcell, skincare, trevira, pes, acrylic, and nylon functional yarns; and lenzing FR, modacrylic, kermel, twaron, technora, and meta and para aramid technical yarns. It also provides knitting and weaving fabrics. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Kayseri, Turkey.

KUTPO.IS.summary: KÃ¼tahya Porselen Sanayi Anonim Sirketi primarily produces and sells porcelain, tableware, and ornamental and packaging materials. The company provides dinner; breakfast; fork, spoon, and knife; cookware; tea; coffee; and spice sets, as well as salt, pepper, sauce, and other products. It also offers steel pots and pans, casting cookware, bowls, porflame pots, oven dish, coffee pots, mugs, and catering products, as well as tea, service, cake, and spaghetti plates. KÃ¼tahya Porselen Sanayi Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Kutahya, Turkey.

LUKSK.IS.long_name: Lüks Kadife Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S.
LUKSK.IS.summary: LÃ¼ks Kadife Ticaret ve Sanayi A.S. manufactures and sells velvet fabrics worldwide. It provides polyester, acrylic, cotton, viscose, and modal velvet for upholstery, drapery, and garment fabrics. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Kayseri, Turkey.

MAALT.IS.long_name: Marmaris Altinyunus Turistik Tesisler Anonim Sirketi
MAALT.IS.summary: Marmaris Altinyunus Turistik Tesisler Anonim Sirketi operates two tourist hotels in Antalya and Marmaris, Turkey. It also provides tourism services. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Antalya, Turkey. Marmaris Altinyunus Turistik Tesisler Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Koc Holding A.S.

MARTI.IS.summary: Marti Otel Isletmeleri A.S. operates and leases hotels, motels, holiday resorts, marinas, restaurants, and other touristic facilities in Turkey. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

MAVI.IS.long_name: Mavi Giyim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
MAVI.IS.summary: Mavi Giyim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the wholesale and retail sale of ready-to-wear denim apparel for men, women, and children. The company offers knit and woven shirts, T-shirts, sweaters, jackets, skirts, dresses, accessories, and denim bottoms. It operates 320 retail stores, 64 franchised stores, and 563 wholesale doors in Turkey; 1 retail store and 1,100 wholesale doors in Europe; 1,200 wholesale doors in the United States; 4 retail stores and 1,000 wholesale doors in Canada; 18 retail stores, 15 franchised stores, and 139 wholesale doors in Russia; and 17 franchise stores and 37 wholesale doors internationally, as well as e-commerce platforms. Mavi Giyim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

MERIT.IS.long_name: Merit Turizm Yatirim ve Isletme Anonim Sirketi
MERIT.IS.summary: Merit Turizm Yatirim ve Isletme Anonim Sirketi engages in the hotel management business in Turkey. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

METUR.IS.long_name: Metemtur Otelcilik ve Turizm Isletmeleri A.S.
METUR.IS.summary: Metemtur Otelcilik ve Turizm Isletmeleri A.S. operates a holiday village in Bodrum GÃ¼mbet, Turkey. It is also involved in the construction and sale of Fugayaz GÃ¼ndogan houses; and generation and sale of electricity through solar power plants. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

MNDRS.IS.long_name: Menderes Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
MNDRS.IS.summary: Menderes Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi produces and sells home textiles, upholstery fabrics, and lining and interlining products in Turkey. It offers beddings, linens, pillow cases, sleep sets, curtains, baby sets, table cloths, woven and knitted fabrics, polyester and cotton mix fabrics, draperies, collar linings, fusible garment linings, and high-strength parasols, as well as specialty technical home textile products, including water-proof, dirt-stain proof, permanent antibacterial, and patient underpads. The company provides its products under the La Notte, Cotton Collection, SNT, SNT Gold, Topline, and Menderes Fabrics brands. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Izmir, Turkey. Menderes Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of AkÃ§a Holding A.S.

NTHOL.IS.summary: Net Holding A.S. engages in tourism and publishing activities in Turkey, Croatia, Bulgaria, Azerbaijan, Montenegro, and the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus. The company engages in the hotel and accommodation, touristic shopping, duty-free store management, and parking area businesses; and car rental, airport transfer, private jet charter, helicopter tour, other tour services businesses. It also publishes books and newspapers, as well as provides bookstore and stationery products and sells jewel. In addition, the company offers food and beverages products; and consulting services related to financing, investment, organization, and marketing and sales. Further, it engages in construction, agriculture activities, and casino management. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

OLMIP.IS.long_name: Olmuksan International Paper Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
OLMIP.IS.summary: Olmuksan International Paper Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells various corrugated boxes and other custom manufacturing goods in Turkey and internationally. It provides fruit and vegetable, transport, shelf-ready, heavy-duty, meat, poultry, seafood, and e-commerce packaging products to food, agricultural, and other industrial sectors. The company was formerly known as Olmuksa International Paper - Sabanci Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Olmuksan International Paper Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in March 2013. Olmuksan International Paper Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Olmuksan International Paper Ambalaj Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of International Paper Company.

ORMA.IS.long_name: Orma Orman Mahsulleri Integre Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
ORMA.IS.summary: Orma Orman Mahsulleri Integre Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells chipboards in Turkey. The company offers melamine faced and humid resistant chipboards used in bedrooms, young rooms, kitchen, dining rooms, children's rooms, office, closets, cloakrooms, TV units, bath cabinets, dideboards, kitchen tables, chairs, coat stands, television tables, headboards, bed base, dresser, counters, and meeting tables; and in seperators, amusement places, library, bureau, factory, upper table of the white appliances, studio, boutiques, banks, elevator, fairs, medical offices, educational fields, yachts and boats, and hotels as a construction materials. It also exports its products to 32 countries. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Orma Orman Mahsulleri Integre Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Gol Yatirim Holding A.S.

OTKAR.IS.long_name: Otokar Otomotiv ve Savunma Sanayi A.S.
OTKAR.IS.summary: Otokar Otomotiv ve Savunma Sanayi A.S. engages in the manufacturing of commercial vehicles in Turkey. It manufactures and sells off road vehicles, armored vehicles, minibuses, autobuses, trailers, semi-trailers, light truck, and cross-country vehicles. The company also exports its products. It serves the automotive, transportation, logistics, and defense industries. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

OZRDN.IS.long_name: Özerden Plastik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
OZRDN.IS.summary: Ãzerden Plastik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells packaging products. The company offers insulated packaging and construction insulation products comprising bizofol; protective packaging products, such as air bubble film and bag, bubble wrap, and air bed; and in-box packaging systems, including airsafe and Ranpak paper cushioning systems. It also provides food packaging products, which consists of chocolate pad; metal packaging products; and supplementary products, such as PE foams, air dunnage, stretch film, box tapes, aluminium and reinforced tapes, masking tapes, PE film, reinforced PE films, protective films, invoice pockets, wrapping ropes, corrugated cardboards, straps, and removal boxes. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

PKENT.IS.summary: Petrokent Turizm A.S. manages holiday resorts in Turkey. The company is based in Ankara, Turkey.

RODRG.IS.long_name: Rodrigo Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
RODRG.IS.summary: Rodrigo Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. provides apparel for men and women; footwear, and accessories for men in Turkey. Its apparel products include T-shirts, polo shirts, shirts, sweats, sweaters, knit wares, jeans trousers, trousers, tracksuits, jackets, raincoats, coats, vests, blouse, skirt, tights, dresses, shorts, bags, and track suits. The company also offers casual and sports shoes; and accessories, including boxers, wallets, belts, socks, bags, shorts, and perfumes. It also operates retail stores, as well as sells online. The company was formerly known as Rodrigo Tekstil Turizm Insaat Gida Ticaret ve Sanayi Anonim Sirketi and changed its name to Rodrigo Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in July 2012. Rodrigo Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1993 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

ROYAL.IS.long_name: Royal Hali Iplik Tekstil Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
ROYAL.IS.summary: Royal Hali Iplik Tekstil Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells carpets in Turkey. The company was formerly known as Naksan Kimya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Royal Hali Iplik Tekstil Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. in December 2007. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Royal Hali Iplik Tekstil Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of NAKSAN Holding.

SAFKR.IS.long_name: Safkar Ege Sogutmacilik Klima Soguk Hava Tesisleri Ihracat Ithalat Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
SAFKR.IS.summary: Safkar Ege Sogutmacilik Klima Soguk Hava Tesisleri Ihracat Ithalat Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells air conditioners. It offers commercial air conditioners for vehicles, such as minibuses, midi buses, buses, and refrigerators; crank-driven and electrical frigorific systems; light-rail system air conditioners and rail vehicles; and special application air conditioners, as well as air conditioners for the defense industry. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.

SANKO.IS.long_name: Sanko Pazarlama Ithalat Ihracat Anonim Sirketi
SANKO.IS.summary: Sanko Pazarlama Ithalat Ihracat Anonim Sirketi develops, purchases, imports, exports, markets, and sells dyed and non-dyed yarns, and artificial and synthetic fibers in Turkey and internationally. It also engages in the hydrophilic cotton weaving, knitting, and clothing of industrial goods and other textile products. The company offers ring carded and combed, melange, slub, core spun, dyed, core twist, and organic cotton yarns; and knitted fabrics, such as single jersey, rib, interlock, two and three thread fleece, terry and towel, and pique fabrics, as well as knitted fabrics with elasthane. It also provides woven fabrics, including stretch, novelty, and overdyed denim fabrics; sportswear; cotton woven fabrics; cot-stretch fabrics; color woven products; and curduroy fabrics, as well as printed fabrics. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

SASA.IS.summary: Sasa Polyester Sanayi A.S. produces and sells polyester fibers, yarns, and chips in Turkey and internationally. The company offers specialty polymers and chemicals, including thermoplastic polyester elastomers, dimethyl terephthalates, plasticizers, advanced polymers, polybutylene terephthalate solutions, and polyethylene terephthalate solutions. It also provides fiberfill, nonwoven, and textile fibers; and DO, flat, draw texturized, and POY filament yarns. The company was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Adana, Turkey. Sasa Polyester Sanayi A.S. is a subsidiary of Erdemoglu Holding A.S.

SEKUR.IS.summary: Sekuro Plastik Ambalaj Sanayi A.S. manufactures and sells plastic packaging products in Turkey and internationally. It offers PE air bubble films, such as standard bubble films, opaque protection products, and insulation products; PE shrink films; PE general packaging films; bag and sheet products; and technical films. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

SILVR.IS.summary: Silverline Endustri ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells hoods, ovens, built-in hobs, built-in dishwashers, and refrigerators. It also produces a range of accessories, such as air recycle sets, aluminum flexible ducts, inox wall panels, decorative grids, aluminum cassette filters, outlets, metal bars, and carbon filters. The company was formerly known as Gumusfon Metal Endustri ve Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Silverline Endustri ve Ticaret A.S. in 2005. Silverline Endustri ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

SKTAS.IS.long_name: Söktas Tekstil Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S.
SKTAS.IS.summary: SÃ¶ktas Tekstil Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the textile and dairy businesses. It produces and sells fabrics. The company is also involved in the agricultural-dairy livestock activities, as well as dairy cow cultivation, milk production, and sale of raw milk. SÃ¶ktas Tekstil Sanayi Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Aydin, Turkey.

SNPAM.IS.summary: SÃ¶nmez Pamuklu Sanayii A.S. manufactures and sells yarns in Turkey. It also produces viscose, tencel, modal, micromodal, microtencel, acrylic, wool, silk, linen, elastane, bamboo, and polyester fibers. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Bursa, Turkey.

SOKM.IS.summary: Sok Marketler Ticaret A.S. operates in retail sector in Turkey. It sells fast-moving consuming products, such as dairy products, pasta, flour, semolina, ground rice and starch products, cleaning products, peanuts, hair dye products, and baby products; make-up products comprise lipsticks, blushers, mascaras, and beauty balms; chocolate products, including Madlen chocolates, biscuits, and chocolate-coated wafers; and cooking ingredients, deli, fruits and vegetables, kitchenware, cleaners, paper products, and clothing. The company operates approximately 8,145 stores in 81 provinces of Turkey. Sok Marketler Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1995 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

SONME.IS.long_name: Sönmez Filament Sentetik Iplik ve Elyaf Sanayi A.S.
SONME.IS.summary: SÃ¶nmez Filament Sentetik Iplik ve Elyaf Sanayi A.S. manufactures and sells yarns and fibers in Turkey. It offers poy, flat, uniform, twisted, and painted yarns for the automotive industry, as well as high flap yarns. The company also leases properties. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bursa, Turkey.

TEKTU.IS.long_name: Tek-Art Insaat Ticaret Turizm Sanayi ve Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi
TEKTU.IS.summary: Tek-Art Insaat Ticaret Turizm Sanayi ve Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi engages in the tourism business in Turkey and internationally. It invests, builds, and operates hotels, resorts, golf, restaurants, cafeterias, casinos and entertainment venues, beaches, amusement parks, marinas, yacht berths, tourist goods sales points, and regulation schools and related facilities. The company operates Club Zigana holiday village and Zigana Hotel resort. In addition, it offers tourism transport and car rental services, as well as acts as a travel agent. Further, the company operates stores, showrooms, and warehouses in ports and free zones. Tek-Art Insaat Ticaret Turizm Sanayi ve Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

TIRE.IS.long_name: Mondi Tire Kutsan Kagit ve Ambalaj Sanayi A.S.
TIRE.IS.summary: Mondi Tire Kutsan Kagit ve Ambalaj Sanayi A.S. engages in the production and sale of corrugated cardboard box paper and scrap paper in Turkey and internationally. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Mondi Tire Kutsan Kagit ve Ambalaj Sanayi A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Mondi Corrugated B.V.

TKNSA.IS.long_name: Teknosa Iç ve Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi
TKNSA.IS.summary: Teknosa IÃ§ ve Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the retail sale of consumer electronics in Turkey. It sells its products through its retail stores; and an online store, teknosa.com. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Teknosa IÃ§ ve Dis Ticaret Anonim Sirketi operates as a subsidiary of Haci Ãmer Sabanci Holding A.S.

TOASO.IS.summary: Tofas TÃ¼rk Otomobil Fabrikasi A.S. manufactures and sells passenger cars and light commercial vehicles in Turkey. It also produces various automotive spare parts, as well as trades in automobile and spare parts; and provides consumer financing services. The company offers its products under the Fiat, Fiat Professional, Alfa Romeo, Jeep, Ferrari, and Maserati, as well as Opar and Magneti Marelli brands. Tofas TÃ¼rk Otomobil Fabrikasi A.S. also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ULAS.IS.long_name: Ulaslar Turizm Yatirimlari ve Dayanikli Tüketim Mallari Ticaret Pazarlama A.S.
ULAS.IS.summary: Ulaslar Turizm Yatirimlari ve Dayanikli TÃ¼ketim Mallari Ticaret Pazarlama A.S. operates a hotel in Turkey. Its hotel has 466 beds in 125 rooms and 41 suites. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

UTPYA.IS.long_name: Utopya Turizm Insaat Isletmecilik Ticaret A.S.
UTPYA.IS.summary: Utopya Turizm Insaat Isletmecilik Ticaret A.S. engages in the operation of tourism, hotel, and shopping mall businesses in Turkey. It operates Utopia World Hotel, a five-star hotel with 348 villa standard rooms, 194 main buildings with standard rooms, 4 deluxe rooms, 21 junior suites, 16 corner suites, 1 king suites, 1 queen suites, and 10 duplex rooms. The company also provides tourism agency services under the REC TRAVEL brand name, which includes ticket sales, reservations and sales of hotels, conferences and events, and vehicle and long-term fleet rental services. In addition, it engages in contracting activities for infrastructure, canal, sewer, and tunnel construction projects, as well as the production and sale of electricity. Further, the company is involved in the construction of public housing estates, commercial and shopping centers, factories, hotels, and holiday villages. Utopya Turizm Insaat Isletmecilik Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

VAKKO.IS.long_name: Vakko Tekstil ve Hazir Giyim Sanayi Isletmeleri A.S.
VAKKO.IS.summary: Vakko Tekstil ve Hazir Giyim Sanayi Isletmeleri A.S. designs, manufactures, trades in, and retails ready-to-wear clothes for men and women under the Vakko brand. It offers shirts and ties, handkerchiefs, shoes and bags, monograms, scarves, and couture; home products; and perfumes, as well as wedding designer for women. The company also provides tea, pastries, ice cream, chocolates, and gift cards; organizes special events; and publishes magazines. In addition, it operates two Vakko Bistrot stores in Istanbul. It offers products through its stores, as well as online in Turkey. The company was founded in 1934 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Vakko Tekstil ve Hazir Giyim Sanayi Isletmeleri A.S. is a subsidiary of Vakko Holding A.S.

YATAS.IS.long_name: Yatas Yatak ve Yorgan Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
YATAS.IS.summary: Yatas Yatak ve Yorgan Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells bed, furniture, quilt, armchair, sofa, home textile, and home furniture in Turkey. It also exports its products. The company sells its products under the Yatas brands. It operates 80 retail stores in Turkey. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

YONGA.IS.long_name: Yonga Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
YONGA.IS.summary: Yonga Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures, sells, and exports furniture in Turkey. The company offers dresser units, dining benches, TV stands, coffee tables, sideboard, bookcases with cupboards, dining tables, side tables, book cases, bench, bookshelf display units, tables, console tables, sofa side tables, tallboy chests and mirrors, highboards, wardrobes, shelving units, beds, desks, storage benches, and bedside and dressing tables. It also provides lamp tables, display cabinets, bureaus, bedside cabinets, table stools, wine racks, trunks, door glazed tops, chest, corner desks, office desks, office filing units, tall glazed units, standalone mirrors, and media units. The company offers its products under the Audely, Duhrer, Shalstone, Bosco, Teramo, Design Project, Sonoma, Colby, and Stockholm names. It also operates in the United Kingdom, the United States, Israel, Australia, and Denmark. Yonga Mobilya Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1974 and is based in Denizli, Turkey.

YUNSA.IS.long_name: Yünsa Yünlü Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
YUNSA.IS.summary: YÃ¼nsa YÃ¼nlÃ¼ Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. provides wool fabric products in Turkey and Europe. It offers men's woolen and worsted, women's, fashion trend, and corporate wear fabrics; and upholstery fabrics primarily used in commercial vehicle industry. The company also exports its products to approximately 50 countries. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. YÃ¼nsa YÃ¼nlÃ¼ Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of SÃ¼rmegÃ¶z Tekstil Yatirim A.S.
